name: Dice Effect
description:
You are a space soldier who needs to progress to a ship full of robots.
You have to fight them all, helped by your (somewhat) trusty dice. Every time you slay a robot, you have new faces that you can add to your dice to make it stronger !

Akitl: Programming
Awaken: Level Art & UI Design
Kemsou: Level Art & VFX
Pixelsoba: Programming
Telemaki: Music & Sound Design. ca.ambi7@gmail.com https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq0DCLkVP5-6KQylfzDLQiQ/about
Ysendrin: Programming

3D Assets from Synty Store
Animations from Mixamo

Game made with Godot
